definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: white;—´[[ל]] abs. Ge 30:35 + 13 t.; cstr. [[לְבֶן־]] Ge 49:12 (cf. Ges:§ 93, 2, R. 1 Kö:Lgb ii, 74 Ba:Nu 166); f. [[לְבָנָה]] Le 13:4 + 6 t.; pl. [[לְבָנִים]] Zec 1:8 + 3 t.; [[לְבָנוֹת]] Ge 30:37 + 2 t.;—white, of wood under bark Ge 30:37, Ge 30:37 (cf. Joe 1:7); of spots on goats v:Ge 30:35 (all J); of manna Ex 16:31 (P); garments Ec 9:8 (sign of cheerfulness and joy); of teeth [[וּלְבֶן־שִׁנַּיִם מֵחָלָב]] Ge 49:12 (poem in J; ‖[[חַכְלִילִי עֵינַיִם מִיׇָּיִן]]) of Judah (on interpr. v. Di and, differently, Marc. Jastr:JBL xi. (1892), 128); of horses Zec 1:8, Zec 6:3, Zec 6:6 (in vision); chfly. of diseased skin or flesh on body ([[בַּהֶרֶת]] Le 13:4, Le 13:19, Le 13:24, Le 13:25, Le 13:26, Le 13:38) Le 13:4, Le 13:10, Le 13:13, Le 13:16, Le 13:17, Le 13:19, Le 13:24, Le 13:38, and of hair on such spots Le 13:3, Le 13:4, Le 13:10, Le 13:20, Le 13:21, Le 13:25, Le 13:26; + [[אֲדַמְדֶּ֫מֶת]] Le 13:19, Le 13:24, Le 13:43, cf. v:Le 13:42; + [[כֵּהָה]] v:Le 13:39 (all P).
